Articles.Content:
When using Alt-X to neutralize trim, the throttle is also cut. These should work independently.

STEPS TO RECREATE: Fly an aircraft. Set trim-up (Alt-S) and 100% throttle. Hit Alt-X to neutralize trim

EXPECTED RESULT: Trim is neutralized. Throttle remains set at 100%

ACTUAL RESULT: Trim is neutralized, but Throttle goes to 0%
